nodes.text: TR-522 was a Human male stormtrooper who operated out of the Dathomir Quarantine Zone during the Galactic Civil War.

TR-522 was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011.
